metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14466 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The GOsa_Filter_Settings cookie in GONICUS GOsa 2.7.5.2 is vulnerable toPHP objection injection, which allows a remote authenticated attacker toperform file deletions (in the context of the user account that runs theweb server) via a crafted cookie value, because unserialize is used torestore filter settings from a cookie.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gosa - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-desktop - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-help-de - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-help-en - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-help-fr - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-help-nl - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
gosa-schema - 2.7.4+reloaded3-10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gosa package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.4+reloaded3-10').
